page.title: 12Sports
page.content: The Yews owner drives a trap with either two horses or ponies at many competitive events: these are a special feature at most local shows and events at stately homes in the Lake District. Fishing is excellent in the river Gilpin in the stretch from Spigot House to Starnthwaite Ghyll; permits are required, and in a good season trout of up to 21 lbs weight can be caught. Smaller fish abound in the Winster in the part below Birket House. Many houses have rockeries built on the natural stone in the ground, and climbing plants are very evident;clematis, wisteria, honeysuckle, and hydrangeas.
